subject: Attention Beneficiary,
body:
Attention Beneficiary,
We have deposited the check of your fund ($5,300,000.00 USD) through
MoneyGram after our final meeting regarding your funds. All you will
do is to contact Money Gram secretary Ms. Alice Robert via E-mail
moneygram@secretary.net
 or 
moneygrammoney175@gmail.com
 She will give
you more direction on how you will be receiving the funds daily.
Remember to send her your Full information to avoid wrong transfer such as:
 Your Receiver's: _______
 Your Country:__________
 Your Telephone No:_______
 Your Address: _________
 Your aged__________
 Your occupation________
 Your Passport Id
: ________
Though, Mr. James Spader have sent $8000 in your name today So contact
the Secretary Ms. Alice Robert as soon as you receive this email or
her WhatsApp number +229 6814 5425 and tell her to give you the
reference number, sender name and question/answer to pick the $8000.
Please let us know as soon as you receive all your fund.
Best regards,
Mrs. Nancy Johnson
Ministry of Finance.

subject: Re: Attention Beneficiary,
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the deposit of my fund. I appreciate your assistance in this matter. Could you please provide me with more information about the process of receiving the funds daily? How does it work exactly?

Also, I noticed that you mentioned Mr. James Spader has sent something in my name today. Could you clarify what he has sent and how it is related to the funds?

I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Jeannette
